sentences.english: The highly complex maneuver is known as the Cheng Fei vault.
sentences.chinese: 这一套高难度的动作便是人们所熟知的“程菲跳”。

sentences.english: This is a game that is worth replaying on the harder difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 本作可玩性非常之高，通关后值得挑战更高难度。

sentences.english: This helicopter is used by the flight group “Berkuts” (golden eagles) that performs difficult flights on military helicopters.
sentences.chinese: “金雕”飞行队用这架直升机做高难度飞行表演。
她经常挑战体操高难度动作。

sentences.english: That is a very tall order . I'm not sure if I can do it!
sentences.chinese: 那是一个高难度的的指示，我不确定是否能做到。

sentences.english: Whatever happened, we work high above the ground like a spider.
sentences.chinese: 无论高难险阻，我们的高空作业“蜘蛛人”一马平川。

sentences.english: The gymnast dared a breathtakingly difficult move.
sentences.chinese: 这位体操选手敢于做惊险的高难度动作。

sentences.english: She's going to attempt a very difficult dive.
sentences.chinese: 她打算尝试一个高难度的跳水动作。

sentences.english: Too small to fully cooperate with Mom for such a delicate task as manicuring .
sentences.chinese: 暂时还不能与妈妈配合剪指甲这么高难度的动作。

sentences.english: I saw you just prefer a fancy foot thing?
sentences.chinese: 我看见你喜欢用一种高难度的步法？

sentences.english: The side somersault is a stunt in three circuits to bunch up the body.
sentences.chinese: 团身侧空翻三周是一个高难度动作。

sentences.english: Or you have some challenging requests?
sentences.chinese: 或者是碰到了高难度的请求？

definition: the splits (move in dancing)/to do the splits/Taiwan pr. [pi3 cha1]
lit. to stretch a hand and grab it (idiom)/fig. easy to do
to move nimbly about, dodging and weaving (martial arts)
to be off the beat/to sound awful (of singing)/(fig.) to wander off the topic/(diving) to step toward the end of the board/approach
(textiles) to scour/to degum (silk)/variant of 精煉|精炼[jing1 lian4]
